question: A block of certain mass is placed on a rough inclined plane. The angle between the plane and the horizontal is 30°. The coefficients of static and kinetic frictions between the block and the inclined plane are 0.6 and 0.5 respectively. Then the magnitude of the acceleration of the block is [Take g = 10 ms⁻²]
explanation: Max static friction μ_s g cos(30) = 0.6 × g × 0.866 ≈ 0.52g.
Since pulling force (0.5g) < Max Friction (0.52g), the block does not move. Acceleration is zero.
